an2.151-162:151.1.1: “There are these two kinds of welcome.
an2.151-162:151.1.3: Welcome in material things and welcome in the teaching.
an2.151-162:151.1.4: These are the two kinds of welcome.
an2.151-162:151.1.5: The better of these two kinds of welcome is the welcome in the teaching.”
an2.151-162:152.1.1: “There are these two kinds of hospitality.
an2.151-162:152.1.3: Hospitality in material things and hospitality in the teaching.
an2.151-162:152.1.4: These are the two kinds of hospitality.
an2.151-162:152.1.5: The better of these two kinds of hospitality is hospitality in the teaching.”
an2.151-162:153.1.3: The quest for material things and the quest for the teaching.
an2.151-162:153.1.5: The better of these two quests is the quest for the teaching.”
an2.151-162:154.1.3: The search for material things and the search for the teaching.
an2.151-162:154.1.5: The better of these two searches is the search for the teaching.”
an2.151-162:155.1.1: “There are these two kinds of seeking.
an2.151-162:155.1.3: Seeking for material things and seeking for the teaching.
an2.151-162:155.1.4: These are the two kinds of seeking.
an2.151-162:155.1.5: The better of these two kinds of seeking is seeking for the teaching.”
an2.151-162:156.1.1: “There are these two kinds of worship.
an2.151-162:156.1.3: Worship of material things and worship of the teaching.
an2.151-162:156.1.4: These are the two kinds of worship.
an2.151-162:156.1.5: The better of these two kinds of worship is worship of the teaching.”
an2.151-162:157.1.1: “There are these two ways of serving guests.
an2.151-162:157.1.3: Serving guests with material things and serving guests with the teaching.
an2.151-162:157.1.4: These are the two ways of serving guests.
an2.151-162:157.1.5: The better of these two ways of serving guests is to serve them with the teaching.”
an2.151-162:158.1.3: Success in material things and success in the teaching.
an2.151-162:158.1.5: The better of these two successes is success in the teaching.”
an2.151-162:159.1.1: “There are, mendicants, these two kinds of growth.
an2.151-162:159.1.3: Growth in material things and growth in the teaching.
an2.151-162:159.1.4: These are the two kinds of growth.
an2.151-162:159.1.5: The better of these two kinds of growth is growth in the teaching.”
an2.151-162:160.1.3: The treasure of material things and the treasure of the teaching.
an2.151-162:160.1.5: The better of these two treasures is the treasure of the teaching.”
an2.151-162:161.1.1: “There are these two kinds of accumulation.
an2.151-162:161.1.3: Accumulation of material things and accumulation of the teaching.
an2.151-162:161.1.4: These are the two kinds of accumulation.
an2.151-162:161.1.5: The better of these two kinds of accumulation is the accumulation of the teaching.”
an2.151-162:162.1.1: “There are, mendicants, these two kinds of increase.
an2.151-162:162.1.3: Increase in material things and increase in the teaching.
an2.151-162:162.1.4: These are the two kinds of increase.
an2.151-162:162.1.5: The better of these two kinds of increase is increase in the teaching.”
